talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Happy_01>I witnessed it with my own two
eyes, Hylian!

You have removed that dreadful sludge
from our statue!
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_00>Our once-sullied statue, which was awash 
in abominable sludge, is pristine again!<sp:5:1:0>
It is all thanks to you!
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>I have no doubt that Lady Yona will be
positively elated!
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>I am overflowing with gratitude to our
valiant Prince Sidon for purifying the
water upstream!
I dream of ascending waterfalls to my
heart's content once we have made it
through these dangerous times!
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Oh?<sp:5:0:0> Link!<sp:5:1:0> Am I mistaken or do you, too,
dream of climbing waterfalls?
talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>Hmm...<sp:5:1:0> Fear not, brave one. I have heard
whisperings that even a Hylian can climb
waterfalls if they wear the <clr:0000>Zora armor<clr:ffff>.
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:TalkPositive_01>Ah, a traveler!<sp:5:0:0> It is amazing that you made
it here through all of the sludge.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>An enormous amount of that muck fell not
too long ago, but you and I have somehow
avoided getting caught in it.
Thanks to Lady Yona's guidance, we were
able to save those buried in the sludge in
the nick of time. However...
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_01>Now that gunk is woefully stuck to our
domain's precious statue...<sp:5:0:0>

Hm...<sp:5:0:0> How are we to rectify this?
talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Hm? <sp:5:0:0>Upon your noble torso...<sp:5:1:0> That is the
Zora armor, is it not?!

With that armor, even a Hylian like you
can experience the joy of climbing
waterfalls!
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:LaughL_00>I now feel no guilt in gushing that climbing
waterfalls is truly exhilarating! Yes, utterly
invigorating!<sp:5:0:0> I implore you to give it a try!
BlackZelda_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I simply cannot believe that she is truly
there... <sp:5:1:0>I can only hope this is some
terrible mistake.
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_01>Ah, it is you! You really helped me out,
so here is a bit of advice for you.

If your gills... <sp:5:0:0>No, wait. You are a Hylian.
What is that thing called? <sp:5:1:0>Ah! Your nose!

In any case, if that thing gets stuffed up
with sludge, you can wash up in the water
from that waterfall.
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:LaughS_01>Do not worry. That is the water that
<clr:0000>Prince Sidon <clr:ffff>cleaned at <clr:0000>Mipha Court<clr:ffff>,
which is upstream.
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Chat_01>I recall that Prince Sidon was once a tad
headstrong...<sp:5:0:0>and now he is handling this
sludge with utmost patience and maturity.
I suppose the old wisdom holds true...
Turbulent waters produce strong fish.
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>I am so grateful to Prince Sidon, who is
bravely cleaning the water upstream!

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>Once we overcome this danger, I hope to
arrange a display of swim dancing at the
base of the waterfall as a token of thanks.
It does not sound so bad, showing our
appreciation while being showered by the
pristine waters of the waterfall!
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy_00>Oooh, yes! Just thinking about it, I can
almost feel those cool waters upon my
overly dry scales!
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>If you wear the Zora armor, even a Hylian
like you can experience the joy of climbing
waterfalls!
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Painful_00>Hm... <sp:5:0:0>It is a shame that I am presently on
guard duty, <sp:5:1:0>otherwise I would jump into a
waterfall myself this very moment!
BlackZelda_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>I sense a fierce battle ahead, the likes of
which we have never before faced.<sp:5:1:0> Now
more than ever, we must train vigilantly.
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Yes, indeed! <sp:5:1:0>The Zora armor is truly
wondrous!

If you wear the Zora armor, even a Hylian
like you can experience the joy of climbing
waterfalls!
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Please, I implore you to give it a try!
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Has that light captured your interest
as well?

I came to investigate, however...<sp:5:0:0> I have no
idea what the cause of that light could be.
BlackZelda_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Sad>Gaddison, who remained in the domain,
was planning to go out and defeat nearby
monsters. I wonder if all went to plan...
In light of everything going on,<sp:5:1:0> I fear the
danger is far more severe than she may
have expected...
Ah, what am I saying? <sp:5:0:0>I suppose there is
no sense in fretting over a heroic Zora
like her.
talk0022:
Alas, that is the extent of my knowledge!<sp:5:0:0>
I am sorry I could not be of more help on
that front.
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Chat_01>As I was watching the pillar of light at
East Reservoir Lake, Prince Sidon came
to see me.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_01>He left me with these simple yet fully
encouraging words... "Leave this to me!"<sp:0:4:0>How very dependable he is!
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think_01>Hmm...<sp:5:0:0> I wonder if I should report this
to Prince Sidon.
BlackZelda_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>We swear to protect this place so that
you and King Sidon can safely focus on
your investigation!
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Thanks to Lady Yona's guidance, we were
able to save everyone in the nick of time.
However...
The domain's precious statue is now
covered in sludge...<sp:5:1:0> What are we to do?
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Chat_01>The water that<clr:0000> Prince Sidon <clr:ffff>is cleaning in
<clr:0000>Mipha Court<clr:ffff>... That is the last pure water
source for all of Zora's Domain.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>We all owe a debt of gratitude to the great
Prince Sidon, who hastily devised a plan
to keep us safe from the sludge...
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think_00>Just gazing upon a pristine waterfall is
enough to cleanse my very soul!
And yet...
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:TalkPositive>When trouble arises, our Zora troops do
not hesitate to set out!<sp:5:1:0> As such, we must
train vigilantly so we are always prepared.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>Gaddison, who remained in the domain,
was planning to go out and defeat nearby
monsters. I wonder if all went to plan...
Ah, what am I saying? <sp:5:0:0>I suppose there is
no sense in fretting over a heroic Zora
like her.
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Hmm... <sp:5:0:0>I do not want to leave this place,
but I think I should perhaps report this
to Prince Sidon.
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Prince Sidon had even more vigor
than usual.<sp:0:4:0>How dependable he is!
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Spirit aside, I also want to cleanse my
material form in perfectly clean waters.
I simply cannot wait!
Ah, to soak to my heart's content at the
waterfall basin... *siiigh* But to do that,
we must first overcome this sludge!
